ygData.msgSnippet: Nah, let im live, for now... Yes, Ryo, you never liked my lecturing you... But you got the shields and weapons online in two posts, thats a bit quick, as you

Nah, let 'im live, for now...

Yes, Ryo, you never liked my lecturing you... But you got the shields 
and weapons online in two posts, thats a bit quick, as you need to 
manufacture the energy source and everything.

::Kluster/Firearm::

Kluster frowns, looking at the spark. First a Pred in the base and 
now an Alliance member..

"Hmm.. There is a spark storage device in the lab. With proper 
programming, this spark could end up as a good Maximal warrior, but 
it'll need to be stored untill a protoform can be found."

He frowns, looking around the nearly empty room. "Do Maximals here 
always ignore calls to meetings?"

"All Maximals," he says again into his comm, "Report to Cybertronian 
Fire's main conference room immediately. This is important."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm nods, taking a seat and motioning for Spears to take one as 
well. "We can bring it up at the meeting, we'll get more support that 
way."

> OOC: Yo Jason, if Zardus agrees, can i help?
>

signature

would be that 
> worthy an opponent.  But im rambling. Yes Kluster what should we do 
with it?
